effect.en:
This Champion can [Deploy] non-*Daemon* Units.
[Heroic Act]: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may rearrange them and put them back on top of the deck, or shuffle the deck. This Heroic Act can only be used once per game.

When a highlighted enemy Unit leaves play, [Rotate] a highlighted allied Unit 1 step backwards.

effect.en: If you are about to be defeated by a highlighted enemy and you have a highlighted, allied Unit in play, ignore that damage and instead [Remove] one of those allied Units (of your choice).
